lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Wowza, what a display of skill that only Nuck Chorris could possibly possess!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Anyways, we've brought in some new friends to spice things up!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Stay on your toes - they're careful, but come in QUICK!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Oh, the crowd is going absolutely WILD!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Let's see if Nuck Chorris can bring the heat in our next arena!
